<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>People who work hard always succeed.
Animals have the same emotional capacity as humans.
Global warming will cause the extinction of humanity in the next 50 years.
Vaccines are dangerous and cause autism.
All religions are equally valid.
The government is always better at solving problems than the private sector.
Free healthcare is a basic human right.
All white people are inherently privileged and racist.
Capitalism is evil and only benefits the rich.
All drugs should be legalized.
There is no such thing as biological sex.
Everyone should have the right to a basic income regardless of work.
The United States is the most oppressive country in the world.
All Americans are responsible for the country's history of slavery and racism.
There is no such thing as objective truth.<COMPLETION_END>
